2170688 - Brayan Rodolfo Barajas Ochoa  


```{r}
n<-15
x<-c(5,4,9,6,21,17,11,20,7,10,21,15,13,16,8)
varmuestral<-(1/(n-1))*sum((x-mean(x))^2)
vars<-c()
for(i in 1:1000){
  I<-floor(n*runif(n))+1
  x2<-c()
  x2<-x[I]
  varmuestral2<-(1/(n-1))*sum((x2-mean(x2))^2)
  vars[i]<-varmuestral2
}

hist(vars)
ecm<-sum((vars-varmuestral)^2)/1000
print(ecm)
```
